title: Let's face it, bot lane is in the shitter right now.
body:
Before you down-vote, here me out. Over the past 2 or so weeks, I've been seeing a bunch of wacky shit in the bot lane, and me being a Draven 1 trick at low diamond-high plat MMR, it can get a little rage inducing. I'm sure you guys of higher elo are aware of the Malzahar support being pretty good right now, due to his ult making an adc useless, but now i'm starting to see Ziggs "adc". Like, i'm aware that adc's are in the worst spot they've been in for A LONG TIME, but I think this might give you guys at RIOT an indication that something needs to change. I've seen the Ziggs carry bot, the Brand, Malzahar combo, now i'm starting to see Darius in the bot lane now too. 

Yes, I'm aware of the "adc is strong due to the fact that you can crit for 1500 by simply right clicking" and the "adc is important for constant DPS for sieging turrets". Trust me, I'm aware, and I'm also aware that if you're good enough at ADC, you can simply carry the game single handedly, but that's not the point i'm trying to make. The point i'm trying to make, is that there's better shit you can put down as a bot lane carry right now, and it's kinda irritating. The only really safe ADC's you can play right now are Cait, Ez, and Jhin in lane, Twitch is good for late game if he can get out of lane, and Vayne, if she gets her IE and Shiv. Other then that, you're pretty much trolling right now. It's kinda lame as fuck. 

Anyways, that's all I have to say about that, I hope you guys @RIOT can hopefully resolve this issue. It's like i'm playing season 1 all over again.

ADCs are basically overpowered once they get ahead or are full build.

But they are very underpowered if they are anything else.

Honestly, the problem isn't just the 4-man botlane fiesta meta.  That's definitely part of it, but that's not the whole reason.  I personally feel that this is all just an outcome of how damage in the game as a whole has been incredibly high since the Season 6 mastery changes.  ADCs are getting instantly blown up by everyone - burst mages, jungle fighters, Sonas, even tanks are killing ADCs extremely quick, and marksmen just can't easily build any defensive items since they need to build all the scaling crit things first.

I honestly wouldn't like to see ADCs buffed, since ADCs are just impossible to fight against when they are strong (nothing you can do to outplay a right click).  But I would like to see the overall damage in the game go down so your average jungle fighters with 2-3 tank items aren't killing ADCs in a couple seconds anymore.

Cry some more.

Way I see it, bot lane doesnt belong to adc and support. Its never should have. Its a map. The Rift. You play what works and where. The whole adc and support thing was created BECAUSE of its variety and niche picking. Was never an intended meta, it just works. Now something else works. Get over it.

If you can convince top lane mains to quite bitching about melee vs ranged with this sort of argument too, that'd be great. Top lane doesn't belong solely to the melee and attempts to balance specifically that issue will run into problems in the long term.

> [{quoted}](name=Anidan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PMquovuO,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2017-01-07T05:18:23.722+0000)

> If you can convince top lane mains to quite bitching about melee vs ranged with this sort of argument too, that'd be great. Top lane doesn't belong solely to the melee and attempts to balance specifically that issue will run into problems in the long term.

Ranged Vs Melee is an issue that isn't exclusive to Top lane. it is just the lane where it is most pronounced.

The problem is that you're not going to balance it in the laning phase, ever. Ranged is always an inherent advantage for a prolonged encounter where attrition tactics can be used, such as the laning phase. Especially in League since it's so easy to kite as a ranged champion. 

Your best option in the laning phase would be to allow top laners to farm something else while the ranged champion is preventing them last hitting due to zoning, make the melee so durable that the ranged poke isn't something to factor in (haha no), or make the melee champions adept at fighting ranged champions - but that only matters when they can fight, so if that ranged champion gets ahead then that fighting advantage is kind of moot. 

I have a question: how would you balance it?

Hell if I know. I'm not the one making the complaint. I was just correcting the poster. lmao
I assure you tho that if i had an answer, i would have provided one. :/

It's a really complicated issue unfortunately :\ 

In League's case it's actually kind of a problem with the game's design as a base at the moment. Almost everything they did to separate it from DotA is actually working _against_ the ranged vs. melee problem and made it worse on accident. Not saying they can't find a way, because I'm sure there is and we just don't know about it yet, or maybe there hasn't been a proper way to go about it that's been introduced to the game, but damn if that isn't a complicated problem.
